name: LEATHERWOLF - Unchained Live [2013] CD
description:
'Unchained Live' is the brand new 2013 LEATHERWOLF album, featuring classic cuts from the band's 4 studio releases, along with a studio re-make of 'Black Knight'!

Engineered by Michael "Kramarica" Kramer, mixed by producer extraordinaire, Roy Z  (JUDAS PRIEST, BRUCE DICKINSON, SEPULTURA, HALFORD), and mastered by Tom Baker (QUEENSRYCHE, JUDAS PRIEST, SEBASTIAN BACH), with artwork by noted conceptual designer Martin Deschaumbault ("Assasin's Creed") and Marc Sasso (DIO, MANOWAR, ROB ROCK).
 
Line-up:
Michael Olivieri - vocals, guitar
Rob Math - guitars
Greg Erba - guitars
Pat Guyton - bass
Dean Roberts - drums

Track listing: 
01. Spiter
02. Kill and Kill Again
03. The Calling
04. Rise or Fall
05. Dr. Wicked (Rx O.D.)
06. Wicked Ways
07. Hideaway
08. Street Ready
09. Thunder
10. Black Knight (studio bonus)

name: LEATHERWOLF - New World Asylum [2007] CD
description:
2006's 'World Asylum' made over, with a returning Michael Oliveiri adding another element of the classic Leatherwolf sound!  

Mixed by Jacob Hansen (VOLBEAT,  PRETTY MAIDS, DESTRUCTION); artwork by Richard Villa III (BLACK VEIL BRIDES, SEBASTIAN BACH)!

Line-up:
Michael Olivieri - vocals
Geoff Gayer - guitars, bass
Eric Halpern, Mark Smith - add. lead guitars
Pete Perez - bass
Dean Roberts - drums

Track listing:
01. I Am The Law
02. King Of The Ward
03. Behind The Gun
04. Live Or Die
05. Disconnect
06. Dr. Wicked
07. Institutions
08. Derailed
09. The Grail
10. Never Again

name: LEATHERWOLF - Street Ready [1989] CD
description:
2002 re-issue of the 1989 scorcher; feat. the MTV video/single 'Hideaway'.

Track listing:
01. Wicked Ways
02. Street Ready
03. Hideaway
04. Take A Chance
05. Black Knight
06. Thunder
07. The Way I Feel
08. Too Much
09. Lonely Road
10. Spirits In The Wind
bonus tracks:
11. Tools Of Discipline (live)
12. Black Jack - drum solo (live)

Line-up:
Michael Olivieri - vocals, guitars
Geoff Gayer - guitars
Carey Howe - guitars
Paul Carman - bass
Dean Roberts - drums

name: LEATHERWOLF - Leatherwolf [1987] CD
description:
2002 CD re-issue of the 1987 major label debut on Island Records; incl. the MTV video/single 'The Calling.'

01. Rise Or Fall
02. The Calling
03. Share A Dream
04. Cry Out
05. Gypsies & Thieves
06. Bad Moon Rising
07. Princess Of Love
08. Magical Eyes
09. Rule The Night
bonus track:
10. The Hook (live) 

Line-up:
Michael Olivieri - vocals, guitars
Geoff Gayer - guitars
Carey Howe - guitars
Paul Carman - bass
Dean Roberts - drums

name: LEATHERWOLF - Leatherwolf [1984] CD
description:
The album that started it all!  2002 CD re-issue of the classic debut that put the Triple Axe Attack on the heavy metal map!

Line-up:
Michael Olivieri - vocals, guitars
Geoff Gayer - guitars
Carey Howe - guitars
Matt Hurich - bass
Dean Roberts - drums

Track listing:
01.  	Spiter  	
02.  	Endangered Species  	
03.  	Tonight's The Night  	
04.  	The Hook  	
05.  	Season Of The Witch  	
06.  	Off The Track  	
07.  	Kill And Kill Again  	
08.  	Vagrant  	
09.  	Leatherwolf
bonus track:
10. Alone In The Night
